hero.title:
BEYOND PROTECTION,
CURATING LEGACY
hero.subtitle:
Preserve the value of your vehicle forever.
Lumière Studio goes beyond simple installation
to curate the intrinsic beauty of your vehicle.

atelier.title:
"Uncompromising Standards,
Proven Masterpiece."
atelier.intro: <0>LUMIÈRE</0> is not just an installation brokerage platform. We are a private collection of Korea's top PPF ateliers gathered under one philosophy of 'perfection'.
atelier.material:
We strictly select and use only <0>High-End Grade Films that have been perfectly verified for physical properties, gloss, and durability among numerous films on the market. Strict standards that do not allow even a single small bubble or minute finishing error
are Lumière's promise to customers.
atelier.network: Starting with <0>high-end studios in the metropolitan area</0>, we carefully select and list <0>master ateliers across the country</0> possessing unrivaled technology and craftsmanship. Not just anyone can be registered; only those proven by skill can use the name of Lumière.
atelier.technical:
We also propose <0>premium technical solutions for the engine and powertrain, the heart of the vehicle, beyond exterior beauty. Through obsessive diagnosis and precise maintenance by master mechanics
who perfectly understand the mechanism of supercars and luxury sedans, we manage your vehicle so that it maintains the performance of the moment it was first designed for a long time.
atelier.outtro:
Beyond simply protecting the car, ensuring your asset value shines forever.
LUMIÈRE proposes the best curation for your vehicle.

process.title:
Obsessive Journey
Towards Perfection
process.desc: LUMIÈRE adheres to uncompromising processes for the intrinsic protection and aesthetic completion of the paint.

step1.title: Details Crafted by Time
step1.desc: We devote as much time as others, or even more, solely to one vehicle. This is not because the work speed is slow. It's because we focus on details, wrapping perfectly inside invisible finishes and not allowing even a single minute particle. LUMIÈRE does not compromise with quality to meet delivery times.

step2.title: Safe Persistence for Paint
step2.desc: We never use films with strong adhesive or irritating adhesion promoters for immediate easy installation and strong initial adhesion. This gives convenience to the installer, but can cause irreversible damage to the paint surface. Even if the installation process is difficult, we insist on genuine films that provide the safest and purest protection to the paint surface.

step3.title: Craftsmanship Thinking Until Removal
step3.desc: The true value of PPF is proven not only by defense against pollution and accidents but also when the film is removed years later. Ensuring the new car's gloss remains alive without damage to the paint when the film is peeled off. That is LUMIÈRE's craftsmanship and promise thinking from beginning to end.

estimator.title: Custom Protection Configuration
estimator.subtitle: Select a model that fits your vehicle size and specify the desired coverage.
estimator.packageDesc: * Final estimate is confirmed after vehicle inspection and film brand selection.
estimator.regionSelectDesc: Connected to master ateliers of the highest grade selected by Lumière in your chosen region.

estimator.searchResultEmpty: No model found in this size class.

booking.title: Private Atelier Reservation
booking.atelierInfo: The master atelier in {region} you selected is a top-tier shop that passed Lumière's strict quality standards.
booking.timeNote: * Time may be adjusted upon reservation confirmation depending on atelier situation.
booking.successDesc:
Reservation successfully completed.
The master atelier in charge will guide you through the detailed schedule via text or KakaoTalk after confirming the deposit.

carCare.title: Premium Mechanical Solution
carCare.subtitle:
Life Care System
Diagnosed by
Best Mechanics
carCare.desc: Beyond simple exterior management, a technical solution that maintains the engine and powertrain condition, the heart of the vehicle, at its best.

intro.diagnosisDesc:
From electronic control system scan via dedicated scanner to underbody leakage and clearance check.
Master mechanics detect and prevent mechanical defects early.
intro.maintenanceDesc:
Maintains best performance with Lumière's unique intensive management system differentiated from existing shops. Beyond simple consumable exchange, providing optimal solutions tailored to driving environment and characteristics
to perfectly preserve engine and powertrain condition.
intro.logDesc:
No need to record service history or worry about consumable exchange cycles anymore. Lumière systematically manages all maintenance data for your vehicle,
and suggests necessary services at the optimal time.

footer.description: Setting a new standard for automotive preservation through advanced materials and craftsmanship. Beyond protection, we curate your vehicle's legacy.
